Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 1266 Official Zoning Map

1266.01Creation and adoption. 1266.02Authentication of Map. 1266.03Recording of Map changes. 1266.04Replacement of original Map. 1266.05Preservation of original Map and records. 1266.06Interpretation of district boundaries.

CROSS REFERENCES

Division of municipal corporations into zones - see Ohio R.C. 713.06

Basis of districts - see Ohio R.C. 713.10

Amendments to Zoning Code - see P. & Z. Ch. 1284
